title: 1967 Split Screen Bus - One of a kind!

posts.content:
Right, Im just gauging interest at the moment. I bought this for myself but have now the opportunity for something I was after for quite a while.

This is one of a kind and I'm sure you won't ever see a paint job like it!

This is an 11 window Bus that was been painted after the TV series 'The Walking dead'. It is currently being shipped over from California so will be 5-6 weeks hopefully.
It spent all of its life in Nevada and the last couple in New Mexico were a local artist painted it and it underwent an engine and Transmission rebuild. 1600 cc engine with 800 miles on it and a freeway flyer transmission. New Brakes and new Brake lines, new gas tank, new safari windows in the front. It has 6 pop out windows in the back. New steering wheel, new tires and rims.
VW Porsche Empie Black 5 spoke rims with 185/60-15 Federal Tires on the back and 165/50-15 Federals Tires on the front.

Has a new 4 in narrowed front adjustable Beam and Dropped spindles/custom control arms and New shocks.

Inside it has a Bamboo Headliner and new upholstery and new carpet.

There is NO RUST on this bus!

It also has new side mirrors fitted.


Things that will need doing.
Needs Antenna
shifting rod needs adjustment.
No radio.
A Wiper Motor needs fitting.(comes with one but not sure its the correct type)
It will need an MOT and registering with DVLA.

ALL TAXES WILL BE PAID BY ME READY FOR REGISTRATION.

Buy and paint or run as is. This is one seriously cool bus!

£17,500. Small deposit secures and if you don't like when it arrives ill refund you in full.

Follow link for pictures. I can add some of it before paint later. (just on my way out the house now)

https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=33768264D9A964AD!354&authkey=!APHyHv8WybznpWU&ithint=folder%2cpng

Added pictures of the bus before paint.

All windows and lights etc, stripped off for paint.

any questions please get in touch.
Please feel free to give me your views on the paint job. Be kind though
